A guitar chord is a set of notes played on a guitar. Chords here
A harmonium is a keyboard instrument that is a lot like an organ.Chords here
A Piano chord is a group of three or more notes played simultaneously.Chords here

"1. Sa (Shudh) 
2. re (Komal) 
3. Re (Shudh) 
4. ga (Komal) 
5. Ga (Shudh) 
6. ma (Shudh) 
7. Ma (Teevra) 
8. Pa (Shudh) 
9. dha (Komal) 
10.Dha (Shudh) 
11.ni (Komal) 
12.Ni (Shudh)

Open Navigation Drawer
Close Navigation Drawer
\'Main Menu\' show multiple option like Gide, Theme, Ratting and etc.
\'Guide\' guide the user, how to use this app.
\'Theme\' Here you can change the theme of the app.
\'Ratting Bar\' here user can give ratting to this app and See Overall ratting.
\'Contact\' Here u can contact to a developer.
\'Exit\' you can exit the app here.
\'Bottom Navigation\' here you can see Guitar, Harmonium, Piano Theory.
\'Guitar Theroy\' here you can access the Guitar Theory
\'Harmonium Theory\' here you can access the Harmonium Theory.
\'Harmonium Theory\' here you can access the Piano Theory.
\'Scale Chord\' here you can access the chords of a particular scale.
\'Transpose\' here you can transpose the chords of a particular song.
\'Scale\' here you can access the scale of a any particular note in Indian and Western music.
\'Tanpura\' here you can play tanpura and train your vocal (riyaz).

‚ùì What is Sangeet Learner?
 Sangeet Learner is a music learning and reference app designed for musicians, students, and music enthusiasts. It helps users find scales, learn chords, transpose songs, use a Tanpura, and understand the theory of instruments like the guitar, piano, and harmonium.


üéº How does Sangeet Learner help with scales and chords?
 - Find the scale of any note quickly.
 - Get chords for any particular note scale, making it easier to compose and play songs.
 - Explore a complete chord library for guitar and piano with diagrams for better visualization.


üé∂ Can I transpose chords of a song?
 Yes! Sangeet Learner provides an easy-to-use chord transposition feature, allowing you to shift the chords of a song to a different key. This is perfect for adapting songs to your vocal range or instrument tuning.


üéª What is the Tanpura feature?
 For Indian classical music learners, Sangeet Learner includes a built-in Tanpura that produces a continuous drone sound. This helps in:
 - Practicing vocal exercises.
 - Learning ragas.
 - Using it as an accompaniment during instrumental practice.


üé∏ What kind of theory does Sangeet Learner provide?
 The app offers detailed explanations and learning materials for:
 - Guitar theory ‚Äì Understanding fretboard, scales, and chord structures.
 - Piano theory ‚Äì Learning about notes, scales, and chord progressions.
 - Harmonium basics ‚Äì Mastering Indian music scales, sargam, and playing techniques.


üéπ How does the chord library work?
 Sangeet Learner has a comprehensive database of chords for both guitar and piano, with visual diagrams. This makes it easy to find and play the right chords for any song.


üéµ Who should use Sangeet Learner?
 This app is perfect for:
 - Musicians and Composers ‚Äì To explore scales, chords, and transpositions.
 - Guitarists, Pianists and Harmonium Players ‚Äì To improve their skills.
 - Indian Classical Music Learners ‚Äì To use the Tanpura for practice.
 - Music Students and Teachers ‚Äì To use it as a learning and teaching tool.


üöÄ How can I start using Sangeet Learner?
 Simply download the app and start exploring the world of music theory, scales, chords, and more! Whether you're a beginner or an advanced musician, Sangeet Learner is your ultimate guide to mastering music. üé∂
